title: Update homebrew formulae and bottles from release.py

content.raw:
It would be nice to update the homebrew formulae as part of the release process with release.py. [Here's an example of a formula update](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/commit/43b09bee4c16b480521edf008dfd25a4ad8bb8bf): an updated tarball link and an updated checksum.

We would need to figure out which repositories have homebrew formulae. Perhaps we can put a file in the `-release` repo with the name of the homebrew formula?

The result should be a pull request to https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation
